actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the corporate surtax exemption in the case of small business concerns.

summary.text: Small Business Tax Relief Act - Increases to a maximum of $100,000, determined on a sliding scale, the corporate surtax exemption under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 allowed to small business concerns (presently limited to $25,000). (Amends 26 U.S.C. 11(d))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the corporate surtax exemption in the case of small business concerns.
